instance.context:
He took out his cigarette case , laid it
beside him .

Mrs Ridley settled herself in a green velvet armchair , laying her stick carefully on the floor
beside her .

She lays the ashtray on the ground
beside the bed then turns towards me ,

But there he was , capering
beside the ruin .

After telling the driver to take them to the marina , he climbed in
beside her .

` God bless you , my son , " Devlin said and climbed in
beside him .

Jules paced
beside her and said nothing at all , imagining no doubt that she was a poor little orphan .

She grabs a hold of my arm and skips along
beside me .

He was with her now skipping along
beside her , holding her hand , laughing and chattering , smiling at her with those winsome green eyes .

Ruth smiled at her son who skipped along
beside them , swinging on Connor 's hand , while Ruth pushed the new baby in her shiny new perambulator .

He took Mr Hellyer 's hand and skipped happily along
beside him .

But she picked the bag up and staggered along while Nick skipped
beside her , jumping the sleepers .

Then , stepping up
beside him , the Judge put up his hand and caught the rope of the alarm bell .

She stomped over to the window
beside Blanche , her voice suddenly strident with anger and sadness .

The waitress trotting along
beside her had seemed unsettled by the other man 's eyes .

As I stood on the walkway , the water level reached above my knees , and I waded along
beside the wall in the direction of the lower door and the river .
Beside me crouched the provost , looking concerned .
Beside the fire sat Doctor Jekyll , looking white and ill .

Philip sat down
beside him .

She switched it off and squatted
beside the kegs to read the labels .

Oliver was on the tow-path , squatting
beside Mr Hellyer .

Stella was standing
beside Alexis .

There he was , standing
beside the bed in grey trousers and a black jersey , and looking disgustingly wide-awake .

Lawton loomed up and stood
beside him .

Emily was standing
beside the stationary Lagonda , holding a bicycle .

Mr Allen was tactless enough to offer his opinion while standing
beside Mr Dinkins .

One of those people who stood
beside you and waved one of those big carpet-beater things .

Here there is a large hanging locker
beside the vanity with two drawers underneath .

Paul bit his lip as he jogged at his father 's shoulder along a trail that wound through fringes of jungle
beside the La Nga River .

It was a command , not a suggestion , and , though she resented being ordered about , she crossed and knelt
beside him .

Deciding that attack was the best form of defence , I knelt
beside him and lowering my head to within inches of his , said , ` Next time , It 'll be the bread knife . "

Everything in the house froze solid -- the water in the kettle , even my false teeth in a cup
beside my bed .

It was he who created the Saturday market and built the church of St Margaret
beside it , just before the end of the eleventh century .

She sat back on the sofa and motioned him
beside her .

Crilly sidles in
beside me with two double shots of Jameson 's .

If Bootsy had a chin , it was not much in evidence and Matthew could see two distinct pimples
beside his nose .

Suddenly Clare jumped up , leaving his bucket to be kicked over by the cow , went quickly towards her , and , kneeling down
beside her , took her in his arms .

Rourke knelt down
beside her and said softly , ` Forget about the police .

Travis watched her for a second , then eased off his load and knelt down
beside her .

The crowd parted and an English doctor stepped over the warning wire and knelt down
beside the man .

Sendei knelt down
beside her as she fiddled about inside the hatch .

Cornelius lowered Tuppe to the floor and knelt down
beside him .

Philip knelt down
beside him .

` Gran ! " she whispered , and knelt down
beside her , squeezing her hand .

` Best get out of them wet things , " he said , kneeling down
beside him , ` so 's I can dry them for tomorrow . "

Corbett dug out his long Welsh dagger , knelt down
beside the grave and prised open the lid .

Several miles away in Queen Margaret Drive , a BBC technician knelt down
beside a music stand and gently pulled a strip of card aside revealing some names and numbers .

Shiona took her hands in hers and knelt down
beside her .

In absolute terror , I lay down
beside him .

Cleo lay down
beside the dog , resting her cheek on one hand .

Then he undressed and lay down
beside her and took her in his arms .

I lay down
beside him and thought about sharing my ideas with him .

Everyone began to tell her that the shortest day had been passed and Fred sat down
beside Anne .

Joyce sits up in the bed
beside me .

Hardly glancing at Berowne 's body Dalgliesh picked his way across the carpet to Harry Mack and squatted
beside him .

She went over to the fire and squatted down
beside the twins , warming her hands and bare feet .

He squatted down
beside her and took one of her hands in his and waited for her to go on .

Benedicta rose and crouched
beside her , stroking her hands gently .

He hurried over to where Ngune lay and crouched anxiously
beside him , horrified at the sight of Ngune 's discoloured , swollen face .

George stopped and Libby crouched
beside him , waiting until her eyes saw the figure by the tree .

He crouched down
beside her and put his hand lightly on her shoulder .

Chamlong , seated
beside Suchinda , appealed to protestors to refrain from violence .
